mapper.select: select P.*, O.*, PF.* from product P left join options O on P.productNum = O.productNum left join productFiles PF on P.productNum = PF.productNum where P.productNum=#{productNum}
mapper.insert: insert into product (productNum, name, category, subtitle, includes, contents, details, cartInfo) values (product_seq.nextval, #{name}, #{category}, #{subtitle}, , #{includes}, #{contents}, #{details}, #{cartInfo})
mapper.update: update product set name=#{name}, category=#{category}, subtitle=#{subtitle}, includes=#{includes}, contents=#{contents}, details=#{details}, cartInfo=#{cartInfo} where productNum=#{productNum}
